page.title: 11A DAY IN A LIFE OF (CTOND)
page.content: {9:00}THIS IS OUR FRIST CLASS WHICH IS USUALLY BEST TURNED OUT HORSE AND RIDER. {9:05}MY SISTER AND I SIT IN THE RING WAITING TO BE SEEN BY THE JUDGE. {10:05}WE COME OUT OF THE SHOW RING NOW ,HOPEFULLF WITH A ROSSETTE. {11:00}WE NOW GO INTO ANOTHER RING TO DO A CLASS CALLED BEST RIDER. {12:00}WE HAVE OUR PACKED LUNCH. {1:00}SARA NOW GOES INTO A JUMPING CLASS. {2:00}ALL THE RESULTS ARE ARE CALLED OUT ON A LOUD SPEAKER AT ABOUT THIS TIME. {3:00}MY SISTER NOW DOES THE GYMKHANA. {4:30}WE GO HOME
